*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to William Selkirk, January 27, 1829. Instructions for surveying.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. Selkerk */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*Weightman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir. We shall endeavor to find you at some place *location_mentioned*on the coast */location_mentioned*and wish you to fire the *location_mentioned*prairie */location_mentioned*at different places as you go along— In case we do not find you, I wish you to continue on the meanderings to the *location_mentioned*forks */location_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*Karankawy*/person_mentioned*, and then go to *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*John Brown*/person_mentioned*s,*/location_mentioned* where you will find a letter of instructions *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Keller*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-27-1829">Jany 27 1829*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr. Wm. Selkerk*/person_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*E. R. Weightman*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Matagorda*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
